short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces a new tab with AviaMagazine's current calendar wallpaper. Select your aviation interest and see the latest site additions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aviamagazine.com is an online non-profit civil and military aviation magazine. We will keep you updated on the latest aviation news, show reports, trips etc. 

The AviaMagazine Chrome Extension will put our popular monthly wallpaper calendar on your browsers tab. You can choose your aviation interest by clicking the top right cog on the tab. Depending on your selection a military or civil related wallpaper will be shown. Besides this the site latest updates are visible on the tab and directly accessible.

Features:
- Shows the current calendar wallpaper in your default tab
- Ability to select your aviation interest. This will change the calendar shown.
- Latest site updates with direct links to the articles.

* For feedback, questions, feature requests or info contact us at info@aviamagazine.com *
Check out the full website at: https://www.aviamagazine.com or download the app in the App Store or Google Play.

Updates:
v1.2: 
- Updated to manifest v3
- Minor UI changes

v1.1: 
- Changed permission settings.
